title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 16.10 - Special plates obtained by dealers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 16.10 - Special plates obtained by dealers

State Regulations

Whenever a dealer obtains or orders a special or
distinctive plate for the purchaser of a motor vehicle, pursuant to Vehicle and

Traffic Law section 403-b, the department shall issue a credit to such
purchaser for any number plates or other temporary or interim plates issued in
advance of the receipt of the special or distinctive plate. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
16.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
